pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, February 25, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister, Minister of Crown-Indigenous Relations Carolyn Bennett, Minister of Indigenous Services Seamus O’Regan, and Minister for Women and Gender Equality Maryam Monsef will meet with the Native Women’s Association of Canada.

Closed to media.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

7:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the annual CARICOM reception.

Closed to media.

Media appearance

12:15 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on TSN’s TradeCentre special.
